mapper.select:
select * from ich_item where 1=1
and cn_name = #{cnName}
mapper.insert: insert into ich_item (id, ich_category_id, resource_id, last_editor_id, doi, series, cn_name, en_name, pinyin, declare_batch, ich_rank, last_edit_date, edit_rank, status ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ichCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastEditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doi,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{declareBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ichRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastEditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

id,

series,

mapper.update:
update ich_item
ich_category_id = #{ichCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_editor_id = #{lastEditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
doi = #{doi,jdbcType=CHAR},
series = #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
declare_batch = #{declareBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ich_rank = #{ichRank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_edit_date = #{lastEditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_rank = #{editRank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ich_item set ich_category_id = #{ichCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_editor_id = #{lastEditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doi = #{doi,jdbcType=CHAR}, series = #{series,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, declare_batch = #{declareBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ich_rank = #{ichRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_edit_date = #{lastEditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_rank = #{editRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
